resources.string: This is the main text to show convocation information to the user

This is the main text to show convocation information to the use. Pioneering cellist and electric cellist, recording artist, composer, producer, and filmmaker Michael Fitzpatrick will share in narrative, images, and live musical performance the genesis of Tuning the Planet, the musical-consciousness convergence project inspired by the friendship of His Holiness, The Dalai Lama, and Thomas Merton, recorded and filmed inside Mammoth Cave. Supported by the Stephenson Memorial Concert Fund
